participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, enjoys discussions about pop culture.
participant_1.background: i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i have never had a steady relationship. i like to spend my money on cars. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and passionate about her work, loves sharing stories of her life and pets.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5cats. i enjoy building houses.
